name: Sona
title: sona.wtf
payoff: Record and Summarize Meetings with AI
shortDescription: Sona is designed to enhance productivity by recording, transcribing, and summarizing conversations. It is ideal for professionals who engage in frequent meetings and require accurate records and insights. Users can operate Sona across multiple devices including Apple Watch, iPhone, and Desktop, ensuring seamless integration into various work environments. An example use case is a team using Sona during meetings to capture discussions and automatically generate summaries and action items.
cons: Limited to Apple devices and desktop
May have privacy concerns with background operation
